entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers beginning this evening and ending overnight then 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming south 30 near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 7. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016
